short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You will find yourself running around in a world of fantastic blocks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As you immerse yourself in a world of fantasy blocks, the Blocky Universe RPG is a role-playing game that allows you to choose a fun character and get ready to combat waves of bosses of all different sorts. 

Will you be able to construct a magnificent stronghold and restore the magic portal as a result of your hard work and the perspiration that you get on your brow as you chop down trees and equip your hero with a wide variety of weapons?
